docs.summary: Work with subscription options

operations.name: Allow One Time Purchases of Product

permissions.name: Manage Stores - all permissions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores data, including products, orders and currencies. This permission scope contains all of the Stores permissions.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

permissions.name: Manage Subscription Options
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage the site's Wix Store subscription options.

params.name: productId
params.doc: Product ID.

params.name: allowed
params.doc: Pass `true` to offer product by subscription and as one-time purchase. Pass `false` to offer product as subscription only.

docs.summary:
Allow for one-time purchase of a product.
 By default, product can be sold only as part of a subscription, not as a one-time purchase.

permissions.name: Manage Stores - all permissions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores data, including products, orders and currencies. This permission scope contains all of the Stores permissions.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

permissions.name: Manage Subscription Options
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage the site's Wix Store subscription options.

params.name: productId
params.doc: Product ID.

params.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
params.doc: Ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to the product. Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options from the product.

docs.summary:
Assign up to 6 subscription options to a specified product.
 Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options assigned to a product.

permissions.name: Manage Stores - all permissions
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores data, including products, orders and currencies. This permission scope contains all of the Stores permissions.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

permissions.name: Manage Subscription Options
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage the site's Wix Store subscription options.

params.name: subscriptionOptions
params.doc: Subscription options info.

docs.summary:
Creates multiple subscription options (up to 100).
 To assign to a product, call [Assign Subscription Options to Product](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/subscription-options/assign-subscription-options-to-product).
 Subscription options that are not assigned to a product will not be visible in the Wix business manager.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

permissions.name: Manage Subscription Options
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage the site's Wix Store subscription options.

params.name: ids
params.doc: IDs of the subscription options to delete.

docs.summary: Deletes multiple subscription options.

permissions.name: Manage Products
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix Stores products and inventory.

permissions.name: Manage Subscription Options
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage the site's Wix Store subscription options.

params.name: subscriptionOptions
params.doc: Subscription options info. Only the passed parameters in each subscription option will be updated.

docs.summary:

 Only parameters passed will be updated.

docs.summary:
Creates a subscription option.
 To assign to a product, call [Assign Subscription Options to Product](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/subscription-options/assign-subscription-options-to-product).
 Subscription options that are not assigned to a product will not be visible in the Wix business manager.

Retrieves all subscription options assigned to a specified product.
 By default, hidden subscription options are not returned. To retrieve all subscription options you must pass `includeHiddenSubscriptionOptions = true`.

 If the specified subscription option doesn't exist, the request will be successful but the response will be empty.

members.name: type
members.doc: Discount type.

members.name: value
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: Frequency of recurring payment.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: false`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Subscription option ID (auto-generated upon subscription option creation).

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description (optional).

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription charge times. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.

members.name: discount
members.doc:
Discount info (optional).
 For example, a $20 discount would be `value: 20`, `type: AMOUNT`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Subscription option ID.

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether the subscription option is hidden for the product (the default is false).

members.name: subscriptionOption
members.doc: Newly created subscription option.

members.name: subscriptionOption
members.doc: Changed subscription option.

members.name: id
members.doc: Deleted subscription option's ID.

members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description (optional).

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription payment settings. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.

members.doc: Discount info (optional).

members.doc: Subscription option id

members.doc: Price calculated after subscription option discount applied, formatted with the currency

members.name: allowed
members.doc: Whether the specified product is available for one-time purchase

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • AMOUNT - No discount
  • PERCENT

Frequency unit of recurring payment Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR
